paragraph.paragraph: This document lists the changes, including additions and enhancements, made between EiffelEnvision 2.5 and EiffelEnvision 2.6.
paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision New Projects and New Project Items:

list.item: Removed obsolete Eiffel syntax from the EiffelEnvision new project and new project items templates.
Fix precompiled project wizard not adding EiffelBase clusters when only EiffelBase is selected.
Adding new WEL or EiffelVision2 items, to projects not containing the respective clusters, will now make the project compile the unmanaged code portion.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Project Configuration:

list.item: Added Build Events project configiguration property page to allow setting of pre and post build event actions.
Added Output Path property to Build project configuration property page to allow alternative specification of a deployment location.
Added a "Edit List" dialog for all list properties such as Debug Clauses and cluster Excluded Items.
All path configuration properties are preserved as written, promoting portability, and not always converted to relative paths. The exception is the Output Path configuration property.
Renamed Build property page to Building.
Some very minor cosmetical changes in property descriptions and names.
Include Subdirectories on the project cluster now correctly respects the associated property in the project configuration file.
New projects and projects converted, using the EiffelStudio Project to EiffelEnvision Project Conversion Tool, are now created with the IL Verifiable configuration property set to No.

paragraph.heading: 2 Eiffel Editor:

list.item: Corrected casing for Result and Current.
Go to Definition now works for Precurors calls.
Go to Definition now works for inherited members not declared in a descendind class.
Fixed issue where the completion list failed to show uncompiled features of a compiled class after a completion list has been shown.
.NET features are no longer displayed with the externals icon representation, in the completion list.
Added complete brace matching.
Fixed editor corruption (black-outs).
Fixed false syntax error conditions, such as a class with no feature clause and no features.
Updated editor syntax to support new Eiffel 5.6 grammar.
Added special "[hide]" comment usage for feature clauses to automatically hide sections of code when opening an Eiffel source file.
Qualified access calls now complete on a static functions.
Added completion for bracketed creation expressions - (create {OPERATING_ENVIRONMENT}).di...
Uncompiled features in a compiled class now show up in the completion list.
Optimized editor refreshing to speed up edition, caret scrolling and selection.
Update feature list and completion icons, and added more icons to represent features more specifically.
Fixed highlighting of Intellisense Method Tip arguments after selecting the corrected overloaded feature related to what is being edited.
Intellisense Method Tips now close when deleting an opening paranthesis, for overloaded features.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Object Browser:

list.item: Added disambiguated Eiffel feature names under .NET Method for clarity.
Fixed missing arguments for Infix routines.
Fixed incorrect usage of Microsoft's private method and field icons for static methods and fields. .NET statics are now the same as would be shown in top-level assembly references.
Fixed documentation hyper-linking for types belonging to an assembly with a class name prefix.
Uncompiled .NET types and members can now be browsed to, from the Find Symbols pane, even if they have not been compiled into the repective project.
Removed "Not Implemented" error messages when double left mouse clicking on .NET type nodes.
Non-exported Eiffel creation routines now show up under the Creation Routines node.
Update all Eiffel related feature and class icons.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Class View:

list.item: Update all Eiffel related feature and class icons.
Class view project icon is now the same as the Solution Explorer/Object Browser project icon.

paragraph.heading: 2 Eiffel Compiler:

list.item: Add notion of Eiffel-compliant so now some non-CLS (common language specification) members can be used in EiffelEnvision.
EiffelEnvision now uses an Eiffel 5.6 compiler.
For all other improvements see ../../../../eiffelstudio/reference/30_compiler/60_version_history/index.xmlEiffel Compiler Version History.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Expression Evaluator:

list.item: Eiffel ARRAYs show count as content value.

paragraph.heading: 2 Tools:

list.item: Added Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker tool for checking third party assemblies for Eiffel/CLS compliance.
Update class generation of the EiffelStudio to EiffelEnvision project conversion tool so it does not generated obsolete syntax.

paragraph.heading: 2 Libraries and Samples:

list.item: Added Graph and Preference Eiffel Source libraries.
Added Examples for graph and preference libraries.

paragraph.heading: 2 Miscellaneous:

list.item: Eiffel source file (*.e) now use the Visual Studio .NET DDE an will open in an active instance of Visual Studio .NET, instead of creating a new Visual Studio .NET process for every file opened from the Windows Explorer Shell.
